item.title: Get Your Npc Help Here! (how you change npc of what its saying and adding npcs)
item.dc:creator: @panthers_08 panthers_08
item.description:
@panthers_08 wrote:

dude what ever… i swer to god cross my hearth that i would die i didnt leech it but what ever…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 01:38:09 AM[/size][hr][quote=“panthers_08, post:1, topic:190208”]Wecome To Npc Help
Please Post on how i did or ill delte thread (that means people wont get help =p)

THIS IS NOT LEECHED!!! STUPID PEOPLE i spent 30mins makeing this if ur not happy with it ill be glad to take it off

Im Going to tell you step by step on how to make npc say diffrent things and how to add a npc.

How To Make Npc Say Stuff!

Well first You Need to open your files
second go in files and look for Npc Handler
Third scroll down tell u see stuff like this-

if (npcs[i].npcType == 541) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Zeke’s Super Shop!”; <— Now right there is what zeke well say in server u can change it if you want to what u want him to say or any other npc.

Your not done yet =p next go back to all your files And Click Compile then enter t then enter. after that u need to update server then it should work!

How To Add a Npc!

Well first You Need to open your files
second go in files and look for Npc Handler
Third scroll down tell u see stuff like this-

if (npcs[i].npcType == 541) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Zeke’s Super Shop!”;

Then at the bottom of all of the npc add another one

if (npcs[i].npcType == -Add pnpc code Here-) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “-type text here-”;
Then paste it below all of the npcs

after that u got to get cords (wich is hard to explain)

after u get cord go compile it =)

then update it!

THEN YOUR DONE =)

how did i do? please post!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 12:42:33 AM[/size][hr]what u guys think?[/quote]

Read full topic
